faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: AI Wallpaper Generator FAQ
faq.description: Common questions about our AI wallpaper generation service

items.title: How does the AI wallpaper generator work?
items.description: Our AI wallpaper generator uses advanced artificial intelligence to create custom wallpapers. Simply log in to your account, enter a description of the wallpaper you want, select a style and size, then click the generate button. Your AI-created wallpaper will be ready to download in seconds.

items.title: What is the quality of the AI-generated wallpapers?
items.description: Our AI generates high-quality visual wallpapers. The Standard plan supports HD resolution, while the Professional plan supports 4K Ultra HD resolution for the most detailed AI wallpapers available.

items.title: Can I use the AI-generated wallpapers commercially?
items.description: Wallpapers created with our Free and Standard plans are for personal use only. For commercial usage of AI-generated wallpapers, please choose the Professional plan which includes commercial usage rights.

items.title: How many wallpapers can I generate with the AI wallpaper generator?
items.description: The number of wallpapers you can generate depends on your plan. The Free plan includes 5 AI wallpaper generations, the Standard plan offers 100 generations per month, and the Professional plan provides unlimited AI wallpaper generations.

items.title: What devices are compatible with wallpapers from your AI generator?
items.description: Our AI wallpaper generator creates wallpapers compatible with all devices including smartphones (iPhone, Android), tablets, laptops, desktop computers, and smart TVs. You can select the appropriate size for your device when generating your AI wallpaper.

items.title: Can I customize the style of my AI-generated wallpapers?
items.description: Yes! Our AI wallpaper generator offers multiple artistic styles including realistic, anime, watercolor, oil painting, minimalist, abstract, and many more. You can specify your preferred style when creating your AI wallpaper.

items.title: Do I need design skills to use the AI wallpaper generator?
items.description: Not at all! Our AI wallpaper generator is designed for everyone. You only need to describe what you want, and our AI technology handles the creative process. No design or artistic skills are required to create beautiful wallpapers.

items.title: How often can I change my AI-generated wallpapers?
items.description: You can change your wallpapers as often as you like, limited only by the number of generations in your plan. Many users enjoy refreshing their device backgrounds weekly or even daily with new AI-generated wallpapers.
